::Firaxis::
       "Aye ma'am."  He picks up the artifact and places it in a storage 
compartment in his shoulder.  "So what do you suppose this thing is?  It 
seems technical but it's way beyond anything I've ever seen."  He shrugs.  
"So where to now?"

--part1_1a6.8215c90.2aae812b_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
